name: 対戦ぴかちゅ～！ ﾋﾞｰﾁﾊﾞﾚｰ編
summary:
两个皮卡丘在海边举行排球比赛

游戏的控制很简单，用方向键控制上下左右，
用Enter杀球，用方向键+Enter扑球，
2P → 跳:R 左:D 右:G 用Z杀球，用方向键+Z扑球

Pikachu Volleyball, also known as Pikaball or Pika V, is an extremely addictive volleyball game featuring Pokemon under Windows platform to play on your school’s computers during spare time. You can play vs computer or another person on your computer for so much unexpected fun. This tiny game in just about 500 KB was originally released by Japanese developers for free and now it has been translated by fans all over countries for its great popularity.


It is a simple volleyball game where the object is to get the ball over the net. The ball is a Pokeball that not only can you hit it over the net, but also you can make it bounce from the border of the window. And you can significantly accelerate the ball by a Power Hit while you are in air.
